entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
